text_content.title: Join us on this wild ride
text_content.subtitle: as bike guide, coach or racer

header.title: Do you make money on your bike?
header.descr: No matter if you're a professional bike guide, coach, racer or a bike vacation provider; or even if you are "only" an aspiring rider who wants to build a living by riding your bike, we have some goodies in our backpack for you.

badges.title: Free Marketing
badges.descr: Whatever product you put up on Traildeer, it's for free until someone makes a booking. Therefore you gain visibility of our rider audience at no cost just a little effort

badges.title: Attract Bikers
badges.descr: Since we're international in nature, your products will be shown to our  audience from other countries and you can attract a wider scope of riders this way

badges.title: Cut Your Costs
badges.descr: Our aim is to help you reduce your marketing and website development costs to the minimum, so that you can focus on growing your own business and riding your bike instead

badges.title: Beautiful Products
badges.descr: Mountain biking is not only a very cool, but also a beautiful sport and therefore we try to make your products shine with little effort required on your end

badges.title: Build Reputation
badges.descr: If you do provide a fantastic experience for our riders you'll be getting great reviews in turn, which will build a strong reputation and ensure your success

badges.title: Join a Community
badges.descr: Traildeer goes beyond making money. We want to connect the world of bikers like never before, so wherever you go in future you will be able find someone to ride with close by

about.title: The home for all MTB adventures
about.descr: We've started with a simple idea - connect local riders with those from other regions, countries or even continents to get them riding together. By now we've expanded to tours, bike camps, expeditions and vacations and soon we will also let service providers in to make the platform the single place to go when planning your next ride.

reviews_sec_header.title: Guides, Trainers & Trailbuilders
reviews_sec_header.descr: Check out what they think about us

reviews.review_text: "I like the idea of connecting riders internationally a lot and look forward to see more people riding together"
reviews.author: Tom Rycak

reviews.review_text: "Putting our trails on the MTB world map by creating an amazing experience for our riders. Thanks Traildeer for helping with it."
reviews.author: Jani Hercog

reviews.review_text: "As an avid rider, documentarist and expedition organizer, what traildeer offers makes a lot of sense to me."
reviews.author: Roman Kalabus

reviews.review_text: "The guys from Traildeer helped me to sign up and create my first camp on the platform and within two days it has been booked out."
reviews.author: Samo Pivko

locations_sec_header.title: Expanding in Europe
locations_sec_header.descr: Traildeer only makes sense if it is really international, so riders can travel to new locations. Every tour,  camp, vacation or expedition in a new country helps us help you to attract riders from all around Europe.

header.title: A quick and simple process
header.descr: We care about high quality of members and the content, however we also want the process to be as easy as possible so that you're up and riding in no time.

steps.text: Ride, get rated and attract more

faq_sec_header_text.title: Frequently asked questions
faq_sec_header_text.descr: We understand you probably have a hundred questions running through your head right now. Here are some of the key ones people are asking, sign up and we will answer the rest.

faq_sec_faqs.ques: How does the business model work?
faq_sec_faqs.answ: A classic marketplace model with a 15% fixed rate for a successful booking  of your product on offer.
After accepting a booking request, we block the money and 24h after the tour we send it to your account.

faq_sec_faqs.ques: How do you maintain quality of the service?
faq_sec_faqs.answ: We rely on rider & provider reviews to sort out the good from the ugly, but also vet all providers and listings.

faq_sec_faqs.ques: Do I need to have a company or be certified?
faq_sec_faqs.answ: That depends on multiple factors such as laws in your country, extent of service you want to provide etc.

bottom_cta.title: Every end is a new beginning

header.title: Es-tu r√©mun√©r√© pour rouler ?
header.descr: Que tu sois guide v√©lo pro, entra√Æneur, coureur ou professionnel des vacances √† v√©lo¬†; voire "seulement" un cycliste en herbe qui veut gagner sa vie en faisant du v√©lo, nous avons quelques goodies dans notre sac pour toi.

badges.descr: Notre site √©tant international, tes produits seront pr√©sent√©s √† notre public d'autres pays et tu pourras ainsi attirer un plus grand nombre de pratiquants.

badges.title: R√©duis tes co√ªts
badges.descr: Notre objectif est de t'aider √† r√©duire au minimum les co√ªts de marketing et de d√©veloppement de site Web, pour pouvoir te concentrer sur la croissance de ta propre entreprise et plut√¥t sur ton v√©lo.

badges.title: Produits magnifiques
badges.descr: Le VTT n'est pas seulement une activit√© cool, mais aussi un beau sport et nous essayons donc de faire briller tes offres avec peu d'effort de ta part.

badges.descr: Traildeer va au-del√† de l'argent. Nous voulons connecter le monde du v√©lo comme jamais auparavant, donc o√π que tu ailles √† l'avenir, tu pourras trouver quelqu'un avec qui rouler √† proximit√©

about.title: Le lieu pour toutes les aventures √† v√©lo
about.descr: Nous sommes partis d'une id√©e simple¬†: connecter les cyclistes locaux avec ceux d'autres r√©gions, pays ou m√™me continents pour les faire rouler ensemble. Nous couvrons maintenant les circuits, camps de v√©lo, exp√©ditions et autres vacances. Bient√¥t, nous laisserons √©galement entrer les fournisseurs de services pour faire de la plate-forme le seul endroit o√π aller lors de la planification de ta prochaine randonn√©e.

reviews_sec_header.descr: D√©couvre ce qu'ils pensent de nous

locations_sec_header.title: Se d√©velopper en Europe
